ygData.subject: Icy Orc camp?
ygData.msgSnippet: (Snip) I like what Verant has been doing though... the Icy Orc camp in Everfrost was a great touch.  I wish that they d go around doing a lot more spawn
ygData.messageBody:
(Snip)
I like what Verant has been doing though... the Icy Orc camp in
Everfrost was a great touch. I wish that they'd go around doing a lot
more spawn locations like this, in a lot of different maps (for all
level ranges).
(Snip)

Agreed!
What level range is the Icy Orc camp? Not looking for spoilers, just
want to know if it is worth investigating as a 22 level bard. Man I'm
really stuck at 22 level. I have a life so the friends I make in EQ
always level past me and it is getting tougher and tougher to get into
a decent group. I probably going to try AC out of frustration.


Any suggestions on a good LARGE guild I might join on Xegony.


Further rambling. The need for an item sink of some sort is a problem
I've seen coming for a long time. Stuff does need to wear out.
Course if you have to replace your prized item periodically that will
encourage even more camping. This of course brings up the issue of
random spawn points... oh never mind.

Bujold
22 level
Xegony


______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
Author: Non-HP-dknadler (dknadler@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 11/2/1999 1:34 PM


From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>

> LOL that cracks me up. People whine to Verant about the
> world not being
> dynamic, then when Verant tries to make a dynamic change to a
> zone they
> whine about that, geez.
>
> Rokenn

Yeah... it happens all the time in this game. People bitch that Cazic-Thule
was too easy to kill - then they bitch that he's too hard to kill. People
bitch that druids shouldn't be able to kite - then people bitch that they
can't anymore. And on and on and on... It's an endless, vicious circle.
Those unfortunate newbies who died in the Kithicor incident don't realize
that they're going to be begging for that kind of event when they get higher
in level. Besides, a death beneath lvl 15, or so, is easily rectified.

I like what Verant has been doing though... the Icy Orc camp in Everfrost
was a great touch. I wish that they'd go around doing a lot more spawn
locations like this, in a lot of different maps (for all level ranges). At
the very least it would alleviate a certain amount of crowding...

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]

> > > varieties, (1hs,

> > >

> > > -5sv disease.
> > >

> > > and I didn't
> > > get a chance at any of them.
> > >
> > > Side note: everyone in the zone
> > > was saying
> > > "I hope hope leave it this
> > > way forever" just like last week in Lake
> > > rathe when the pets were
> > > spawning like crazy and
> > > everypne was saying

> > > TWO examples of people LOVING a
> > > zone, BOTH
> > > of which Verant KABONG'ed.
> > > Makes you wonder if they really WANT us
> > > happy.
> > >
> > >
> > > Uldar Ulfangson
